duties_responsibilities.duty: Select, label, palletize, and deliver correct products using electric pallet jack or forklift.
Operate Sysco Order Selection (SOS) unit to create labels and place labels on products.
Stack products on pallets according to proper selecting procedures.
Engage electric pallet jack or forklift to transport products and stage pallets for loading.
Follow safety work methods, advise supervisor of unsafe conditions, and comply with sanitation requirements.
Maintain and safely operate assigned equipment including pallet jack, SOS unit, and personal protective equipment.
Perform pre- and post-trip inspections, and safely operate all mechanical equipment.
Shrink-wrap product on the loading dock.
Attend required company meetings and perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or General Education Development (GED) or equivalent.
